title: This Boy Was Slowly Turning Into A Stone When A Celebrity Came In For Help
text:
IN OMG! ON 21 Feb, 2017 This Boy Was Slowly Turning Into A Stone When A Celebrity Came In For Help Share on twitter Follow Us On 
The story of a boy turning into stone sounds like a fairytale, but for 11-year-old Ramesh Kumari, this story is a reality. He lives with an extremely rare skin condition that left him deformed and barely able to move, but his life was changed by a celebrity's generosity and will to make a difference. 
His story is shocking, but the help he receives from the most unexpected of places is truly inspiring. Let's read more about him. This Boy Was Slowly Turning Into A Stone When A Celebrity Came In For Help 754 396 Boy Is Slowly Turning Into a Stone #1 Ramesh Was Like Any Other Baby At Birth 
Ramesh Kumari was born a normal baby in Nepal, but 15 days after birth something peculiar began to happen. Ramesh began growing hard, black scales were appearing on top of his skin and his mother was all terrified. #2 Doctors Claimed It Was Simply A Fungal Infection 
Ramesh's mother Nar took him to doctor and they told her there was nothing they could do. It turns out it was not a simple fungal infection, but something far more serious. #3 His Condition Is Extremely Rare And Debilitating via 
Ramesh's parents, Nar and Nanda, couldn't possibly afford the necessary treatments to cure his condition. All they could do was make their young son as comfortable as possible. He could hardly move or speak, and it was almost impossible to make friends. Ramesh needed a miracle. #5 One Star Saved The Day When She Came To Town 
British soul singer Joss Stone was having a concert in Kathmandu, and she decided to pay Ramesh a visit. Little did he know his entire life would be changed. #6 The Joss Stone Foundation Was Raising Money For Ramesh 
Her concert in Kathmandu was being held to raise money for the little boy's treatments. The singer even visited Ramesh and brought him gifts, a charitable act by a generous celebrity. #7 The Little Boy's Condition Began To Improve via 
Ramesh was in bad shape when he started treatment, but with the generosity of the Joss Stone Foundation, he is expected to be able to walk again. This is a remarkable act of selflessness by a celebrity, and her help has changed this young boy's life forever. Had you been in place of that celeb, would have you helped the kid? others like
